name: HOP RACE
description:
Run on the beach, jump in the cool crystal water with a buoy in the summer. Furthermore,
In HOP RACE, you could deep in a melody of trending music which make you love and feel the beats. It is tailor-made for who love music and play visual 3D game design. After all, HOP RACE is a relaxation game and great time killer app. Let’s PLAY and HOP!

MAIN FEATURES:
* High-quality and popular music sound-track.
* Simple gameplay and easy play for the first time.
* Include free options to unlock songs and collect gems
* Challenge yourself with so many levels.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Drag your finger to move the character.
* Try not to fail and match the music beats.
* Collect gems more to unlock new contents.
LET's JOIN!
